snippet: Zach Johnson pulled away with three straight birdies on the back nine at Kapalua, Hawaii, and closed with a seven-under 66 to win the Tournament of Champions.
abstract: Zach Johnson wins the Tournament of Champions in Kapalua, Hawaii, with seven-under 66.
lead_paragraph: Zach Johnson pulled away with three straight birdies on the back nine at Kapalua, Hawaii, and closed with a seven-under 66 to win the Tournament of Champions.

headline.main: Johnson Wins Tournament of Champions in Hawaii
